title: Shen's sword looks dumb when dragged around
body: Just walk to lane and watch the sword and you'll see what I mean. It looks like Shen has a dog on a leash that refuses to move. Just make it so if Shen is out of combat for 20 seconds it disappears, then reappears at his position in combat.

replies.body:
maybe one of his abbilities throws the sword around maybe?
his Q could be used to drag or throw the sword
I find the way he walks looks hilarious, looks like he's walking through waist deep water struggling to get anywhere.
I don't mind the really big tether radius, but I expected it to smoothly stay at max range, not keep snapping into place every couple of steps.

I don't really see a point in the leash being as long as it is. Unless someone has made a big play with it for an across the map slow? It's possible but would take a lot of planning and probably not worth the trouble.
